name: Press [space] for Space
description:
Use the gravitational fields of the planets to help guide the astronaut from spring to spring. Avoid getting sucked into the sun or outside the solar system to stay alive.

W-A-S-D : Moving the guy

Space : Use a spring to jump away from the planet with great force.

This game was made by Jesper and Birk for a game-jam with the theme "Spring"
